item.title: Views from the Field â€“ Real World Security Operations
item.description: Last week, we have the good fortune to talk to Jorge Fernandez, Director of Special Services at Admiral Security Services about some real world security operations where our guard tour system is used. We got some useful insights from the conversation and I thought I would share them with you. The Value of a Guard Tour System We always wonder where our customers get the greatest value from our products.
